text: Hey, I got a message from a local actress. She wants to collaborate with us.
I can't remember her name... Anyway, I don't think I've heard of her before, but she seems to have a decent following.
Hmm, interesting. What does she want to collaborate on?
She didn't specify, but I assume she wants to do a video or photoshoot together.
I don't know, I'm a bit nervous about working with someone else. Plus, what if she steals our fans?
I doubt that would happen. And who knows, maybe we could gain some new fans by working with her.
I don't know, it just seems risky.
Come on, let's give it a shot. It could be a great opportunity for us.
Alright, I trust you. Let's do it.
A new girl wants to collaborate with us! Unfortunately, we're not ready yet as we need more equipment. It's time to set up our studio!
